data.title: 127. Walking with Stan Rosenberg | Parks Road, Oxford
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Language of God on Spotify. Weâ€™re trying a new segment on the podcast where we walk with someone, letting the place inspire the conversation. Today we take a walk with historian Stan Rosenberg and talk about the history of science and faith, inspired by some of the buildings built in the 19th century at the University of Oxford that show the often blurry lines between the sacred and the secular. Then, the conversation moves back all the way to the 4th and 5th century with a discussion about science and faith in the mind and the times at Saint Augustine. Join a conversation about this episode on the BioLogos Forum.
